graph.symmetry

Class PermutationGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.symmetry.PermutationGroup

  • public class PermutationGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a permutation group and contains methods for its analysis
    Author:
    Renata

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PermutationGroup(Permutation reflection, Permutation rotation)
      Constructs a permutation group given a reflection and/or a rotation

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isSemiRegular

        public boolean isSemiRegular()
        Checks if the group is semi-regular Group is semi-regular if no permutation which is not an identity has fixed points
        Returns:
        true if the group is semi-regular false otherwise
